name: Macintosh System 6
rivals: ANTI and WDEF (arch-nemeses), A/UX and GS/OS (friendly rivalries)
character_details: Macintosh System 6-tan is represented as a very tall woman appearing to be in her early to mid-twenties with medium-length dark grayish-blue hair. She is a cyborg and has super strength, representing the leap in stability from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 onwards, as well as being one of the references to System 6.0.8's codename of 'Terminator'. She can often be serious, by instilling a lot of order at the Mac House, but can also be boisterious and enjoy friendly competitions with others. She can be kind and loyal, but has a strong competitive streak, and can sometimes get carried away and get aggressive. Her hobbies include writing, creating HyperCard stacks, and building machines.
